summary: This is a communication from a US Department of Justice Communication Technician at MCC-New York, dated August 12, 2019, regarding a request for phone records. It includes attachments likely containing the requested records.

persons.name: Communication Technician
persons.role: Communication Technician at US Department of Justice MCC-New York
persons.context: The sender of the correspondence, identified by their job title and location, requesting phone records.

events.title: Phone Records Request Communication
events.description: A Communication Technician at the US Department of Justice MCC-New York sends a correspondence regarding a request for phone records.

locations.address: MCC-New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007-1704
locations.description: The Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, where the Communication Technician is based.

keyFacts: The document is a communication dated August 12, 2019, from a DOJ Communication Technician at MCC-New York.
The subject of the communication is a request for phone records.
The communication includes attachments, likely text files containing the requested phone records (e.g., 6317_08.09.19.txt, 6385_08.09.19.txt).
The correspondence originates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, where Jeffrey Epstein was held at the time of his death.
